title: Formula of arc length
text: The formula for the arc length of a sector is the $$radius the$$ central angle in radians (theta).

title: Converting to Radians
text: The first step is to convert 140° to radians. To do so, the formula is (pi/180°)*140°. What is 140° in radians?

title: Calculating Arc Length
text: Now that you have the central angle in radians, you can calculate the arc length using the formula $$radius \theta$$. What is the arc length?
